question: What are you making:
answer: It's going to be a tree, I think.

question: What's a tree?
answer: It's something they have on Earth. You know, where your cousin went.

question: Where is Earth?
answer: Didn't you study six-dimensional geometry in school?

question: Yes, I know the equations---I just can't see it in my head.
answer: Even I have trouble with that sometimes. Earth is in outer space. And we're in inner space.

question: I don't understand.
answer: Wait till you're older. Here -- watch this. You see, a tree is a living thing.

question: Can you create life?
answer: No, no, just the illusion of life. A kind of half-life, maybe. A pale shadow of the real thing. But it is lovely, the way the light plays over the surface. . .

question: I was keeping an eye on her.
answer: Thank you, Zaltar, but she has to obey the rules.

question: You and your husband have been kind to me, Alura. I have something to tell you
answer: But where?

question: Put your fingers there, Kara. And press hard. Good. Now, go make something pretty. I've discovered a new way into the Phantom Zone.
answer: But the phantom Zone is for criminals.

question: It's big. And empty. I'm tired of limiting myself to Argo City. I want to do something new. I'm starting to repeat myself here with this airy, glittery stuff....
answer: But Zaltar---you founded the city! It's yours. We were all just refugees from Krypton when you gathered us together and brought us here, to the inner dimension. You can't abandon us now. You have a responsibility to us!

question: I'm an artist, Alura. My work comes first. Other people come second.
answer: How can you create beauty...with a selfish heart? The spiky insect-creature flies closer and closer around the little girl's head, buzzing angrily. Her look of delight turns to fear. She tries to shoo the creature away. It flies off toward the thin membrane that encloses the city.

question: It was my fault. You aren't old enough to use the wand. I shouldn't have given it to you.
answer: But the Power Source, Zaltar.

question: It couldn't be helped. The city will have to make do with three.
answer: But what will happen?

question: Over here George. It's the perfect spot. Nice view.
answer: You sure are a good cook, Selena. Man, that looks too pretty to eat.

question: Better eat it quick. It won't look too pretty when it's all covered with ants.
answer: Selena, I've been thinking. It's time I settled down---and I don't know a nicer lady to settle down with than you.

question: Why George, are you proposing?
answer: Marry me, Selena. The hardware store doesn't bring in much now, but...

question: George---I thought you'd never ask.
answer: What the heck is that?

question: A squirrel Frisbee? That's funny. I'd swear I know just what this is, but I've never seen it before.
answer: Hey, where you going?

question: I've got things to do.
answer: What about my proposal?

question: Call me next week. Maybe we can have lunch.
answer: Hey! My truck!

question: I am almost an adult. This is what I want.
answer: But Kara, no one has ever gone from here to Earth. The journey is dangerous.

question: It was my fault we lost the Power Source.
answer: Years ago. And it was Zaltar who stole it.

question: Yes, I do want to go. But someone must go. Our scanning shows the Power Source has finally reached the Earth. It could destroy everything unless someone brings it back.
answer: Superman will return it.

question: Why haven't you been able to contact him? He should have returned from the neutron galaxy ages ago. He may be dead.
answer: But what can you, a mere girl-

question: Don't worry about old Nigel, I can take care of him. He's just a sore loser.
answer: I don't want much, Selena. I have simple tastes.

question: What do you want?
answer: Western Europe.

question: I'm sorry, but I already promised Bianca she could have Switzerland. You know how she loves to ski.
answer: No problem. She can have it. I hate mountains.

question: Cheer up, Nigel. It's not the end of the world.
answer: It may well be. I know how you won that election Selena. You can't fool me.

question: I have plans Nigel. You could come with me... I'm going places.
answer: You're not going anywhere. Except back to nowheresville. You're too impatient, Selena. Look around you--all these people have served years and years of apprenticeship. Some of their families have been in the Craft for generations. You can't join and take over our whole organization in a few months.

question: I just did. Because I have the Power.
answer: You're going to pay a terrible price. The power of Shadow is tricky. Use it too much and it takes over.

question: Bianca's taught me all! need to know. I'll be safe, as long as I don't go too far.
answer: Cigarette? Sorry. Forgot you were trying to quit.

question: Nigel, get out of here. And don't come slithering back. Nigel shakes his head.
answer: You need me, Selena. I'm the only one who can save you from a terrible fate.

question: I need you like an Eskimo needs a lawnmower. Now burn rubber.
answer: Make me. Balefire on you, Selena!

question: You Scorpios can never take a joke.
answer: You think you are on top now. Well there is someone coming to challenge you. I saw it in the cards this morning.

question: Throw him out.
answer: You won't last a year, Selena. The cards don't lie!

question: Thank you, sisters and brothers of the Craft. It is a great honor you have given me, and I will try to be worthy. And when my secret plans are revealed -- you will learn that we are on the threshold of power and influence undreamed of when Nigel was our leader. And now, ,I call upon the Great Mother--the spirit of Nature --- to bless all our endeavors in the coming year...
answer: Is this Nigel's doing?

question: It's a warning, that's for sure.
answer: Maybe it was just an accident.

question: There's no such thing as an accident. Everything has meaning, if you can read the signs.
answer: Then what does it mean???

question: Don't you believe in knocking?
answer: Oh, yes. Knocking. The pre-entry signal. I forgot.

question: What can I do for you?
answer: I'm Linda Lee. The letter's in your files. Under K, for Kent. I mean, it would probably be there, if you received it.

question: It wasn't anorexia. It was the food. Wow, you're Clark's cousin?? Fabuloso! Clark's a hunk. My sister Lois was a real nerd to let that one get away. You'll love it here, we have a great dorm, some really insane characters, I mean radical craziness...
answer: I can do that.

question: No sweat. When's the rest of your stuff arriving?
answer: There isn't any.

question: This is all your clothes?
answer: I have money to buy more, but I haven't had a chance since...

question: Since what?? Did you have a fire at your house or something?
answer: I'd rather not talk about it.

question: You're not...an orphan are you?
answer: My cousin Clark is my only relative on Earth.

question: Oh wow, I should've known. Me and my big mouth. Listen, you can borrow any of my clothes you want. Any time.
answer: Thank you. You're very kind.

question: I'm real sorry, Linda, I should've known it was something tragic if you show up without a wardrobe. Here, try on this. And this.
answer: She did that deliberately.

question: She's a beast. How'd you do that?
answer: Must've been a defective puck.

question: Keep an eye peeled for Myra. She's out to get you.
answer: But what for?

question: Stop the car! I said stop, I didn't say run into a brick wall.
answer: What is it?

question: The Coffer of Shadow. Look at it. What does it mean?
answer: The danger. The one Nigel spoke of. It must be near .

question: Oh, fiddlesticks. What could be dangerous about a baseball game?
answer: Softball.

question: It must be the girls. One of the girls.
answer: But which one?

question: Drive on. We have already attracted enough attention. We'll bide our time and keep watch. Young girls just can't keep a secret. If one of them's up to something--we'll find out.
answer: And then, like great cats---we pounce! And destroy!

question: Bianca, try not to be so bloodthirsty when you're at the wheel. OK?
answer: Sorry, mistress.

question: I cut my own hair once. I looked so awful the only thing was to go totally punk! Your hair looks the same.
answer: It was just a trim.

question: What's in it? Wow! Pig-out time. Come on Linda.
answer: No thanks. You go on.

question: You sure?
answer: Mother! Is it you? Where are you??? Mother, this world is so big. I don't know where to begin to look. But why? I have super powers. Nothing can hurt me.

question: Mother! Is it you? Where are you??? Mother, this world is so big. I don't know where to begin to look. But why? I have super powers. Nothing can hurt me.
answer: No plans for the weekend, Linda?

question: No, MR. Danvers.
answer: Can't have you moping around the campus. Why don't you come home with us for dinner?

question: Finished your estimate?
answer: Well, there's several ways to go .

question: Come in, have a drink, we'll talk. You must be very popular in the neighborhood. I always see your truck parked around.
answer: I have a lot of repeat business. People seem to like my service.

question: I bet they do.
answer: What's that big black scar on the ground? Like a fire.

question: Oh, you know how parties are. Always some damage.
answer: Now we could put in rhododendrons or lilacs...depending on how alkaline your soil is.

question: I just love plants and growing things. It must be wonderful to have green thumbs. Cheers!
answer: Uh, no thanks, I don't drink during the day.

question: But look, it's almost sundown!
answer: Really, I'm not thirsty. Now I could put in some honeysuckle there and there...

question: Just take a sip or .I'll be hurt. It's an old family recipe, I'm famous for them.
answer: What is it?

question: A passionfruit smoothee.
answer: Well, just one.

question: To us. And to the seeds we'll plant together.
answer: I'll drink to that. Hmmm. Delicious! Now, about my fee...

question: Sleep well. And when you wake, drown in my eyes and be all mine. If that's the Jehovah's Witnesses again... Don't go away, gorgeous. I'll be right back. Nigel, get lost.
answer: I have to talk to you.

question: You're wasting your breath.
answer: You used to listen to me. When you asked me to teach you something of the Craft.

question: ...trust the wisdom of the ancients, trust the Great Mother to protect us... Why. are you staring at me like that?
answer: I was just thinking, if I had your skin problems, I'd use a good tannisroot ointment. Every night.

question: Nothing's wrong with my skin.
answer: Such a shame. You ought to take better care of yourself.

question: Hey, Linda! It's my roommate. You'll love her. She's really off the wall! Linda babes! There's this all-night party at Eddie's... his folks are away...
answer: Oh, I don't know. I'm not signed out for an overnight.

question: Go back, sign in, and climb out the bathroom window. McCloskey's always zonked out
answer: It doesn't seem right.

question: Please, as a favour to me? So I won't be the only girl?
answer: Look at that guy!

question: What a space cadet. Hey, you dingleberry! Get outta the street!
answer: Why is he acting so strangely?

question: Thank you. I'm going to close this up again.
answer: Wait...don't leave me in here...

question: It's for your own protection.
answer: What's happening?

question: I'm taking you to the hospital.
answer: Let me out. I have to talk to you.

question: Don't leave me.
answer: I have to.

question: When can I see, you again ?
answer: Relax. Tomorrow this will all seem like a bad dream. Goodbye.

question: Why did she have to show up now?
answer: Eliminate her.

question: That's easy for you to say, Bianca.
answer: You can do it. You're the most powerful woman on Earth.

question: Am I? Still?
answer: Yes! You own the Coffer of Shadow. Nothing can withstand its power.

question: I've been saving it. For the right moment.
answer: That moment is now! What good is a sword unless it be unsheathed? Use it, and no one will dare oppose you again. No one.

question: Not even Nigel. What do I do? I don't know her name.
answer: The Naming of Names is not necessary. Just concentrate on her face. Your Shadow will do the rest.

question: Power of Shadow hear me. Find her wherever she be. Find her and destroy her. Next time, remind me to do this out in the yard.
answer: Yes, of course, it was foolish of me.

question: I think I'd better keep it.
answer: Whatever you say.

question: Leave this place and do no harm.
answer: A Supergirl... Linda...is it Linda?

question: I didn't want anyone to know... but I was so tired...forgot...
answer: Are you all right?

question: Just need rest, that's all. Sorry about all the damage outside. I had to fight some terrible thing...
answer: But why?

question: An evil force. Trying to destroy me. You won't tell anybody, will you?
answer: Not even my wife. And, if there's anything I can do to help---I'd be honoured.

question: This won't take long. Keep the motor running.
answer: Oh no, not you again.

question: What an adorable hat.
answer: They think I have a concussion.

question: And you think you're in love.
answer: I know it.

question: This "love" of yours will soon wear off. I gave you a temporary love potion.
answer: Why should I believe you?

question: It's the truth. In twenty-four hours you'll forget all about that girl.
answer: Then I'm not the only one who saw her. You did too!

question: Yes, yes I saw the whole thing. How could you be interested in that puny little girl?
answer: But she is real, it wasn't just a concussion.

question: Forget her, you're mine. I saw you first. Here. Drink this. It's an antidote to the love drug I gave you.
answer: Nurse! Nurse!

question: You can't escape from me that easily. I'm afraid you don't know who I am.
answer: Nurse!

question: Don't think I'm weak, just because I'm a woman. I have Power. Give in, stop fighting me, Ethan. I always get what I want.
answer: Nurse! Help ! Get her away from me. She's crazy.

question: They're over for you sweetheart. Now you see who you're dealing with.
answer: Leave me alone.

question: This is your problem, right here. This girl's driving you insane, Ethan. Let me help you.
answer: I don't want your help.

question: Come back to my house. My car's outside.
answer: No!

question: You're alive! She didn't kill you!
answer: Who didn't?

question: That woman who's after me. She hates you. Because she knows I love you.
answer: You love me?

question: My angel. My goddess. I feel I've always loved you all my life. I'll die if I can't spend the rest of my life just looking at you, holding you in my arms...
answer: We have to have a long talk about all this.

question: This is my favourite place in the city.
answer: Are you sure it's all right for us to be here?

question: They don't care, they're tearing it down for a shopping centre. Like it?
answer: Yes. It reminds me of home.

question: Where Superman's from? Krypton?
answer: No. Argo City. It was on a chunk of rock that was part of Krypton once---but we moved it to inner space.

question: I'm sorry, I don't understand.
answer: It's not important. The important thing is I'm here to find something and I think you can he1p me.

question: Come on, let's ride. I used to work here summers when I was a kid.
answer: Ethan, tell me more about this woman who's after you.

question: Let's talk about us, not her.
answer: Tell me where I can find her.

question: I don't want you to go near her. She's bad news.
answer: But be reasonable. If I don't do something to stop her she'll try again. And maybe hurt you.

question: I'll be safe with you. We can stay together the rest of our lives.
answer: We can't do that.

question: Why not ?
answer: We're from different worlds.

question: Just give me a chance to show how much I love you. Love changes everything. Love makes everything possib1e.
answer: All this talk about love, it's silly.

question: You don't like me? You hate me?
answer: Of Course I don't hate you. I don't hate anyone.

question: What do you feel about me?
answer: I...I don't know. This is all so sudden.

question: There's one sure way to find out how you feel.
answer: What's that?

question: Let me kiss you.
answer: No.

question: You're not afraid are you?
answer: Of course not, but...there are things we don't understand.

question: If we wait until we understand everything we'll be dead. Come on. You can learn more from one kiss than from years in school.
answer: Well...I guess one is all right. Is this how?

question: What a touching scene!
answer: Who are you ?

question: I am Selena. Give him to me. Now. Or you'll both be sorry.
answer: I don't scare that easily.

question: Yookoohoo! No, that's not it. Sis-o-reb! Nope. Ka-ma-hoochie!
answer: Sure glad you didn't let make a monkey of you.

question: Shut up, and get me a hacksaw.
answer: Why don't you use the Coffer of Shadow?

question: I don't feel like it right now.
answer: She didn't take it from you, did she?

question: That little girl? Ha. Now go on, get me some tools.
answer: There's no need. I learned the Craft from my grandmother. Sycoraka f'kah s'koo...

question: Good. Now bring the car. We must call a meeting of the seven.
answer: Yes, mistress.

question: I thought I'd show you one of my favourite places.
answer: It's paradise . We could be very happy here.

question: But I have to go back. I brought you here so you'd be safe. From her.
answer: You can't just abandon me. Alone.

question: I'll stay for a while.
answer: Great! I'II build a house-- right over there, with a veranda looking out to sea. And I'll plant a garden! Papayas, pineapples, bananas, mangoes--- anything'll grow here. And I'II fish in the lagoon, and we can go sailing in a dugout canoe, and---

question: By the Rite of Ultimate Power. One person must volunteer to take on the combined power of us all.
answer: You! You want to take our power for yourself!

question: Nige1, you know the one who takes on Ultimate Power must sacrifice the last sparks of her own spirit. Which of you is willing to make that sacrifice?
answer: You would! You revealed our existence so you could have all of our power.

question: Maybe you'd like to get rid of this Supergirl yourself, Nigel?
answer: Why get rid of her at al1? You've used the Coffer of Shadow too much. It is beginning to rule your heart.

question: Ethan, what IS wrong?
answer: She said it wouldn't last.

question: What wouldn't last? What's the matter with you?
answer: I don't love you any more.

question: Just like that?
answer: Like turning off a light. I feel awful. All that romantic garbage. All that mushy talk.

question: Where are you going?
answer: Away. From you.

question: But why?
answer: Because you remind me of all the dumb things I said.

question: I sort of like what you said.
answer: That makes it worse.

question: But I don't understand.
answer: Of course you don't. We're from two different worlds, remember?

question: Hi.
answer: Hello. Are you still mad at me?

question: I'm not mad at you.
answer: It seemed that way to me.

question: I know I was acting funny---I'm sorry. It's just...I miss it.
answer: Miss what?

question: What I had before. What's not there now. It's like I woke up and found part of me wasn't there any more
answer: And now?

question: And now...the guitars are out of tune, and the words don't make sense, and somebody unplugged the mike...
answer: Well...I don It know much about these things, but maybe if you had that feeling once...it can, come back.

question: You think so?
answer: I don't see why not.

question: But what if---it wasn't real?
answer: Feelings are real. Once you've had them, they're yours forever.

question: Hey, listen, when all this blows over, maybe we could get together every now and then and see each other. And maybe something might. happen again. What do you think?
answer: Are you asking me for a "date"?

question: Why not? You're a good-looking girl. And I'm--- available.
answer: Aren't you forgetting about Selena?

question: There's something very dangerous about her. Something evil...
answer: I know what it is. She has this lead container shaped like a gargoyle. Inside there's a silvery ring...

question: That's the Power Source that was lost from Argo City! That's what I came
answer: In this big old house on Orchard Avenue---but you better stay away from there.

question: I can see through walls. I could surprise her. The only thing I can't see through is lead, that's why I didn't see the Power Source at the amusement park.
answer: Wait. Don't leave me.

question: You'll be safe here. I'll come back as soon as I have the Power Source.
answer: Before you go...

question: What?
answer: Just one kiss. For old times' sake.

question: And you can see how you feel about me, right?
answer: Yes.

question: Ethan! Hey take it easy. I won't hurt you.
answer: I thought .it was her, coming back. Spared me. But I thought. . . maybe changed her mind. Nigel warned us. Wouldn't listen to him.

question: What are you talking about? Where's Selena?
answer: No. Don't want to know. She's bad. Don't go near her. Hurt you.

question: I'm wise to your tricks, lady.
answer: I could force you.

question: If that worked, you would've done it already. No, you want me to drink it of my own free will. Well let me tell you, sweetheart, it'll be a cold day in hell before I fall for that one again.
answer: Go on, talk big! I'll soon have you purring like a kitten. You've been without water for a whole day. Let's see how thirsty you get in a week.

question: You vicious--
answer: Careful, don't make me angry. I start fires when I'm angry. I told you I'd win.

question: Zaltar.
answer: Kara? Is it you?

question: What is this place?
answer: This is the Phantom Zone. But why did you come here from Argo City?

question: I was on Earth...
answer: Earth? You crossed the dimension barrier? By yourself?

question: Yes. I went there to find the lost Power Source...
answer: Shouldnt've done that.

question: ...but the person who has it. tricked me, and sent me to the Phantom Zone.
answer: It's dangerous to use a Power Source on Earth. It can unleash all sorts of terrible forces---

question: I know.
answer: Well, nothing we can do about it. Come into my house. You can stay with me, until I build you your own place. I expect you won't want to mix with the others-- not our type of people.

question: Others?
answer: Criminals. A few hundred parasangs that way. I avoid them. And you should too.

question: ...mid pleasures and palaces though I may roam..."
answer: What? Palace? Hardly.

question: Just feels, a little, like a tiny bit of Argo City...
answer: Yes. Can't seem to get away from that style. Must try something new.

question: It's lovely. . .
answer: No, no. Not lovely. 'Perfect'. Did everything just right. Nobody telling you to change this, move that around. Please yourself. That's the secret of happiness.

question: Are you happy, Zaltar?
answer: What kind of a question is that? Of course

question: But what about other people? Don't you miss them?
answer: I look at them all the time. Every planet in the galaxy. It's quite boring. Here, rub some of this onto that bruise.

question: You look at them? How?
answer: The Phantom Zone overlooks everywhere.. If you have the right tools. There you see? What could be more boring than that?

question: Wait. Could...could I see the place I just came from?
answer: It'll only make you sad. This goes closer. This moves it around. And this begins.

question: I had to dump the papers in a trashcan. The Danvers have been arrested!
answer: How do you know?

question: I saw them dragged out of the Administration Building.
answer: Did anybody notice you?

question: I can't help it if men notice me.
answer: Lucy! Be serious. We could be executed for treason!

question: Just kidding. Nobody saw me.
answer: I sure wish Superman was around. He wouldn't let any of this go on. Not for one minute.

question: I wish they'd tell us what they're going to do with us.
answer: I heard stories. I don't think you wanna know.

question: Hey! Ethan!
answer: Hmmm?

question: Remember me? We were in a disaster together. Right! Say, do you swing any weight around here?
answer: A little.

question: Can you get us out? It's all a misunderstanding. We thought they were selling hamburgers in that place.
answer: I'll mention it upstairs.

question: Zaltar, please help me.
answer: Of course, my dear. What can I do?

question: Help me to get back to Earth. Where my friends are. They need me.
answer: There's no way out of the Zone. No one's ever escaped. That's why they send the criminals here.

question: If there's a way in, there must be a way out.
answer: No, that's not true---there's well...no-- There is a way.

question: I knew it!
answer: But it's impossible.

question: Why?
answer: No, it wouldn't work, you couldn't, it's too--- if it didn't work you'd be swept into a singularity--- no, you'd never make it. Forget I mentioned it. I could do it.

question: Then teach me how.
answer: No, it's no good---you can't practice--- you only get one go. A thing like that. No. Sure you don't want a sip of this? It's delicious, I think.

question: Tell me how. to do it. If you could do it, I can.
answer: Takes a long time, you know, learning the wand. Just begun to understand it myse1f. Give things a kind of life--can also take away life; works backwards too. Besides I can't let you take my wand. Only have the one, what would I do? I'd be helpless. It's out of the question.

question: Then come with me.
answer: Leave the zone? What would I do on Earth?

question: You could do anything. You could sculpt mountain ranges...draw with rainbows! You'd have superpowers.
answer: Superpowers. Got you in a lot of trouble, didn't they?

question: Please. I have to get back to Earth. My friends are in trouble. And unless I bring back the Power Source, Argo City will die.
answer: Oh, all right. Stop crying. Let's go.

question: You're going to take me back?
answer: Going to try. Didn't say I could.

question: I heard my mother ask you once "how could a man with such a selfish heart create beauty?" She was wrong, Zaltar, you have a generous heart.
answer: Not doing this for you. Just sick of this place, that's all. Wretched singing sculptures, always yowling at you. Boring!

question: What's going on?
answer: Guess! Go on.

question: I don't know. You seem afraid.
answer: You're a regular Einstein, aren't you?

question: Supergirl?
answer: Quit staring so hard. You'll strain your eyes.

question: You're not going to hurt her, are you?
answer: You can't put her out of your mind, is that it?

question: Well...I guess I can't.
answer: I'm ready for her. I'll show you. Unless Supergirl agrees to go away forever, the serpents will drop them one by one.

question: Why the empty cage?
answer: That one was for you. But I thought I'd wait and see how you behave when Supergirl gets here. I'd hate to lose you, Ethan.

question: I've been in love with you for years. Remember how you used to visit your sister in the newsroom? And put your fingerprints on my lens.
answer: Remember? I was trying desperately to get you're attention.

question: You were? You mean we could've been... you-know-what... all this time?
answer: You bet your ass.

question: Why didn't you tell me?
answer: You're supposed to guess.

question: Why are you stopping?
answer: Stopping? Was I? Silly. One thing you musn't do. Oh dear! The wand. Use it. Good girl! That's the way! You can use the wand.

question: Better than when I was a child.
answer: I remember you then. Cute thing you were. Like your mother. What's that? Never saw anything like that.

question: Don't stop. Keep moving.
answer: Yes, mustn't stop.

question: It's Selena. I'm getting so I can recognise her work. Zaltar. Use the wand!
answer: Too late. Too late. Save yourself. Goodbye...

question: Turn it against her.
answer: No. I am your mistress. Do not harm me. You are my shadow, you must obey me.

question: I've got it! The Power Source!
answer: Thank you. I'll take this back to Argo City.

question: It is you, then, really?
answer: Well?

question: It's you all right.
answer: I'll make it easy for you.

question: I never doubted you for a moment.
answer: I'm free. I can never thank you enough.

question: For what?
answer: Ever since I found that thing I've been like a prisoner in a terrible nightmare. You have no idea how awful it is to be mean all the time.
